body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Andrew Lee. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Megan. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad. I need to return a product.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Megan. Can you provide me with the order number of the product you wish to return?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five four six two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Megan. Can you also confirm the last four digits of the card used for payment?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That would be zero three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for verifying that information, Megan. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Megan. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a wonderful day!
